content.detailedDescription: fivewitnesses saw cone-shped object which caused a rumbling noise when it passedover their house.  object hovered over river, later over another hous; all thelights in that house went on.

content.detailedDescription: The following report was sent to george filer by rev chubenko: i wanted toreport this sighting, since it occurred at approximately 12:45 am july 15, 2001,over the town of carteret, new jersey.  i am an orthodox ukrainian priest -- andmy son (who is a funeral director was going out on a death call) gets in touchwith me via his cell phone at about 12:40 and tells me i need to get dressedquickly and come outside.  he was just getting ready to get on to the new jerseyturnpike when he saw a huge collection of lights numbering about 30.  fatherbelenko went outside and observed numerous lights moving slowly. at least sixwere dimming and brightening in unison.See complete report in filers files 29, 30 31, 32, 33, #34 www.Filersfiles.Com
content.summary: Twnty moving lights over carteret, nj

content.detailedDescription: 1.I was looking out the downstairs window.2.Itmooved verry quickly.3.I was unsure what it was.4.I just stared at it at itbecause even though i experienced fear26 anger i was interested because id neverseen anything like this before.Afterwords i had strange dreams.5.It jus kind ofhoverd for a minute and thensped off.6.Traveled so far i could not see it.
content.summary: I was looking out a window and saw silver disk wit
Lights in the sky over a backroad in rural nc

content.detailedDescription: We were sitting on our back porch, watching the stars and airplanes.  weobserved the object appear out of the north and travel to the south at a veryhigh rate of speed.  the object appeared to be dimly lit, emitted no noise andtravelled in a straight line.  about 45 minutes later the object reappeared,travelling from the southwest to the northeast.  the first sighting, the objectappeared to be ovoid in shape3b however, the second sighting, the object appeared to be more of an elongatedrectangular shape.  it was hard to get any better observation3b because the object appeared so suddenly and was gone within seconds. we aresure that it was the same object, since the dim peachy colored glow was thesame.There was no mention of it in the local paper the next day or the dayafter. it is doubtful that many could have seen the object, since it appearedand disappeared so quickly and it was fairly late at night.We lost sight of theobject, when it disappeared over the horizon.  i have been interested in ufossince i was a little boy3b but this is the first time that i have actually observed something quitedifferent than anything else that could be explained.What is curious to me isthat if it were a physical craft, why would it not have created a sonic boom?  iwould think that anything that would have been man made, would have created asonic boom, travelling at such a high rate of speed!!
content.summary: Object travelled north to south at a high rate of

content.detailedDescription: after mowing the lawn i was putting the mower backin the garage. i looked up to the ne5ba habit since im an amature astronomer and a former private pilot5d i saw two silvery dots in the sky. first i thaught they were high flyinggulls. but they did not move. i got my 80mm telescope that was in the garage.After fumbleing around with the scope i was able to get one of the objects inthe field of view. it turned out to be two brite silvery ball shaped objectsclose together. at that time i told my daughter to keep an i on them and i wentin to get my video camera. i was able to get one of the objects on tape for acouple of seconds before a cloud moved in and covered the objects. the tape isnot that good. it was vary sunny and hard to focus. two hours later5b6:30pm5d when the clouds moved off i breifly saw one of the ojects in the same exactlocation. it then faded out.
content.summary: Two silvery balls. day time

content.detailedDescription: after a very strong thunderstorm, i left the houseat 2 am.  it was extremely windy outdoors, but the sky was very clear.  as i wasdriving down our rural road along the ridge of a mountain, i noticed somethingin the sky which, upon initial observation, appeared to be a plane with itsinterior lights on.  upon closer observation, there were actually two rows ofbluish-green lights with a very bright strobe-like light in the center.  thething that struck me the most was that this object was stationary in the sky,although it seemed to be the height of an airplane.  i got out of the car,something i never do when driving alone (i usually have all my doors locked whenim driving) to get a clearer look, and then really realized that this was noordinary thing i was looking at.  got into the car and tried calling my husband,but as i was dialling and watching, the thing made a right angle turn away fromme, shot out a spurt of light, and disappeared.
content.summary: Two rows of horizontal blue/green lights with a la

content.detailedDescription: im doing this again. you may not have gottenfirst. was at a light waiting to cross street. heard helicopter. looked up. sawone pulling large banner-ad. was about to look down as banner was leaving myfield of vision. something very high above--straight up-caught my eye. told myfriend. she looked up and saw too. a cluster of round objects. just there--notmoving. watched about 2 minutes. then one of them moves off to the right, nottoo far. starts to go round and round in a tight circle. a bit later, anotherdoes same. then high cirrus clouds come and block our view. as we are strainingto see, one of themcomes out of the clouds really fast going north. we bothfollow it until about10 seconds later, when again it is obscured by high clouds.It looked like it was going about 5 times the speed of a really fast militaryjet. we looked back but could see nothing more. wow is all i can say. what wasthat?!
content.summary: Daylight sighting of circular objects

content.detailedDescription: the object first appeard as a bright light in thesky.Object moved rapidly across the sky to come just slighlt over head.At thispoint the object stopped in mid-flight for about 5 seconds.The object made aslight course change and proceeded much slower than its previous rate. about 30seconds after the course change manouver the light changed to a moresilver/metal hue then very slowly faded away.When i first saw the object ithought it was a star, when i noticed movement i thought it was an airplane. iwas waiting for the jet engine sound and to see the blinking lights found onapproaching aircraft. neither of these two events occured. i became moreintrigued as i watched the object move very quickly across the sky. when theobject stopped i was stunned. i know this is not physicaly possible. then itchanged direction, i knew i was seeing something i could not really account for.When it disappeared all i could do was shake my head and go back inside myhouse.
content.summary: Bright light stopped change direstion then disappe

content.detailedDescription: Narrative description july 13, 2001, 9:30 p.M.,  green swamp, west of orlandoreported to tampa bay mufon hot line.  (727)595-7964while driving home on state road 474 west of orlando, witness #1 and his son (13year old) saw a pin ball like object, 30-40 inch diameter seen in rear window ofhis automobile.  it was reflecting back the details of the rear lights of thecar.  it was shimmering as they drove and they both had the feeling that theywere being watched.  he drove faster thinking that something was coming on us.  as he looked at the rear view mirror the reflection was as a convex chromiumsurfaced object (pin ball) and he said he had difficulty focusing on it.  hethought the object to be 3-4 feet behind his car.   he said that there wassomething blocking the night sky as he looked up.   when they reached the end ofthe road they noted that there was an increase of light without any visible shadows.  both witnesses were frightened.  when they examined the car uponarriving at home (10 or 15 minute drive), there was nothing on the car or backwindow, no oily residue.
content.summary: 20-30 " pin ball-like object track auto four feet

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my living room, watchingtv, when there was a very load explosion. every door and window in the houseshock. i thought that it was a furnace or gasoline explosion close by. i ranoutside, and everyone in the neighborhood was outside, wondering what happened.I turned on the radio later on, and got a williamsport radio station, gettingcalls from people in williamsport, reporting the same thing. williamsport isabout 32 miles north of lewisburg. later, talking to relatives, i found out thatthey also heard the explosion in selinsgrove (20 miles south) and sunbury(15miles south-west of lewisburg. it was truly a scary experience.
content.summary: Load explosion shook the house for 5-10 seconds

content.detailedDescription: i was awakened by a car alarm sounding, after afew minutes went to close the window. i saw a blimp shaped object hovering tothe west. it had a row of lights bisecting object horizontally. the lightsbrigthened and dimmed and all changed color. the object started to move to thesouth, then it reversed course. it performed a couple of loops and kept movingnorth and south. i called and woke up my wife, she saw what i was looking at andaskes what that was? i couldnt say for sure. i got my binoculars and returnedto the window but object had moved further west, lights were still visible butdetail was lost.
content.summary: Blimp shaped aircraft spotted at night, unusal mov

content.detailedDescription: my husband and i were watching a movie video, andthe object was seen at about 22:15 to 22:30.  as i was watching the movie, amoving light caught my eye out the window.  i turned away from the tv to look atit and expected to see an airplane flying towards the medford airport on finalapproach (united airlines 737s regularly fly over our area enroute to landingat medford).  our house is at approximately 2,000 feet msl, and is locatedoutside talent, oregon3b we are able to see the city of medford in the distance, to thenorthwest.Instead of seeing an airplane, there was a slow-moving blue lightmoving toward the right (our window faces due north).  my next thought was thatit was a shooting star, and i told my husband, look at that light, expecting itto disappear very quickly like a shooting star.  he looked and saw what hedescribes as a blue light with a light blue circle around it3b then it went out like a light---not like a shooting star trailing debris.Myhusband said that the crew of a ual 737 which flew over about 1 to 2 minuteslater, was pointed in approximately the same direction, and could easily haveseen the phenomenon.  my husband is a licensed private pilot and former airforce navigator.  the object moved in a straight line, toward the nne,descending away from us as we looked to the north.  i thought that the objectwas at an altitude similar to that of other aircraft which fly over our house. my husband thought that its altitude was probably quite high---at least thatswhat my husband estimates, but that is perhaps because he thought that it iseasy to compare its track to that of a meteorite entering the atmosphere.Wewould appreciate knowing if other people observed this phenomena tonight.Myhusband typed this narrative with my input.
content.summary: Blue light above medford, oregon
A triangular shaped object  observed several years
Driving home when we saw the ufo

content.detailedDescription: Was reading the newspaper and heard the dogs barking on the beach.  curiousabout the barking i went out to check.  the dogs were barking at this light andsince there is a little reflected light from an outside light i could see thehair standing up on their backs.  they seemed more excited than frightened.  myfirst thought was that a ship was anchored in the bay.  this idea was quicklyeliminated because of the size of the light.  the bay was very rough but thelight remained stationary.  it appeared to be about 10 feet in diameter at thatdistance, and fifty to one hundred feet above the water, and there was a strongreflection from the water.  there was no indication of what the light could be. have seen many ships, helicopters, etc., but nothing similar to this.  wouldhesitate to call the object a ufo but also could not say it wasnt.  there wasno sound from the light but the rough water would or could have hidden it. watched the light for five or ten minutes then scurried to the house forbinoculars.  just as i adjusted the binoculars the light disappeared as thoughsomeone had turned a switch.  after the light had disappeared the dogs continuedto growl and act a little excited but followed me when called.  i estimated thedistance at five miles but it could be off a mile.  quite familiar withdistances because of experience as a pilot and as a member of the coast guardaux.  since i live on whitefish bay and fish, and patrol it my judgement isfairly good but not infallible.
content.summary: Whitefish bay-lake superior - bright white light

content.detailedDescription: ken26 i drove upto topanga canyon 20:45, on a thursday night in june of 2000. ihave been having some sort of feeling or urge to go there that night andasked if he wanted to go so that i would not be alone.  we stopped at the top ofthe mountain, there is a newly renovated park their which closes at 9pm (21:00),but there were other cars parked, people standing out side.  we were in my 99jeep wrangler, i had the top down and i usually carried a pair of binocularswith me.  it was a very clear26 beautiful nite, no high winds, or clouds. topanga is part of the santa monicamountains, south of edwards air base. ken was the first to see the object. hestated  hey, look, that star is moving!.. i looked up and didnt see it at first,until he pointed it out, just above us.  it was amazing, it had an orange color-glowing, it was smooth moving, and just there. its path moved across the sky atleast for 30-45 seconds..26 then just disappeared into a faded descent up.  its kind of hard to explainbut we both saw it leave, yet, both or views of how it left26 the color change was different, except we did both agree that the colorchange was like a silverish liquid type of form. and how it left was straight upwith a smooth silver or vapor trail up that dissappeared just as quickly as ithad appeared.  thats when we noticed just behind us over the hill top of theplatform where we were, there was another object, just over the trees,displaying lights
content.summary: Smooth glowing orange egg/oval shaped object movin

content.detailedDescription: I was just sitting outside the chili discgolf club........400 scottsville-chili road when i casually looked at theparking lot and noticed,initially 3 objects darting up in the sky a ways awaydarting back26 forth, blinking out,moving rapidly.Then they were joined,at various timeswith 3 more- - -all the while darting back26 forth-- up26 down across the sky.......The moved slowly from a due north position to amore easterly position over a period of 9-10 minutes........Both of ourattentions were distracted momentarily by a bike-rider that said hello and wenever saw the objects again tho we looked for approx. 5/6 min. after to see ifthey would come back!
content.summary: Saw in northern sky,at least 6 silvery,fast moving

content.detailedDescription: at 5:45 pm driving south at 55 mph in right-hanelane on rt. 3 in ma around hanover/pembroke area.  a storm front to the south,clear sun to north allowed for clear visability ahead.  noticed a slight whiteflash, as if something popped below the clouds ahead to my right at 2 oclock...Thought it was sunflash off of a plane, but the flash didnt diminish, so itcaught my interest.  my next thought was how fast it seemed to be approaching,following the line of the highway.  as it got closer i saw that there were nowings, then that it wasnt a helocopter.  i also observed a strange aura/trailaround it similar to the heat that rises off a hot road. no sounds, seemed alsoto have a slight wobble3b maybe caused by the aura, as it seemed to blur the outline.  object silvery,seemed to have black on it3b shape seemed to resemble a trashcan (or r2d2 from star wars) continued toapproach, and passed overhead and behind me and i lost sight of it.  observedother people in the cars around me also looking into the sky as they passed me. total time of sighting less than 7-8 seconds
content.summary: Silvery trashcan shaped object, very fast, strange

content.summary: In 1999 i saw a sphere of light over my house.

content.detailedDescription: i attended the 4th of july fireworks display inthe town of henrietta, ny on 7/4/2001.  at approx. 10:10 pm i noticed that westof the fireworks were at least 5 white balls of light - they appeared as largestars.  i thenwatched them travel at a very high rate of speed for only a veryshort distance.After that they would come back into the same line they wereoriginally inand just sit there, hovering as if they were watching thefireworks. i knowothers saw them, pointed to them and looked with disbelief, buti dont knowif they reported them.  the person with me that night wont allow meto list her name. she wont talk to anyone about it. shes very frightened ofthe subject. the lights were still there as we were driving away.  i felt warmduring the sighting, and watched in an almost trance-like state -  but felt verycold/shivery as we began walking to the car to leave. my friend was in abighurry to get out of there.
content.summary: Ufo sighting during fireworks display!
